nodes.text: Belnar was an astronomical body located in the Colonies region at the coordinates M-9. Prior to 3 ABY, some insurrections occurred around Belnar, during of which Everi Chalis, an emissary to the Galactic Empire's ruling council, punished the crew of the starship Mandible over for accident, executing those responsible. Chalis later cited the Belnar Insurrections to the crew of an Imperial heavy freighter in 3 ABY, referencing the punishment of the Mandible's crew to threaten the freighter into changing course.

Belnar was first mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed. In Star Wars Legends continuity, the planet Belnar was first mentioned in Wanted by Cracken, a sourcebook written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and published in 1993.
